00015 template <class T> unsigned int Node<T>::hasChildNode(T value)
00016 {
00017         // check T, caus for T = NodeOfTrees* we don't want to compare the pointers, but the objects
00018         if ( (string)typeid(value).name() == "P11NodeOfTrees")
00019         {
00020                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<childNodes.size(); i++)
00021                 {
00022                         if (*(NodeOfTrees*)childNodes[i]->value == *(NodeOfTrees*)value)
00023                                 return i;
00024                 }
00025         }
00026         else
00027         {
00028                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<childNodes.size(); i++)
00029                 {
00030                          if (childNodes[i]->value == value)
00031                                 return i;
00032                 }
00033         }
00034 
00035         // we did not found a node with the given value -> throw nodeDoesNotOccur exception
00036         throw (bool)1;
00037 }

00039 template <class T> Node<T>* Node<T>::insertChildNode(T value)
00040 {
00041         unsigned int pos;
00042         // search if a Node with the word already exists in childNodes (if there is one -> get its position)
00043         try 
00044         {
00045                 pos = this->hasChildNode(value);
00046         }
00047         catch (bool nodeDoesNotOccur)
00048         {
00049                 // node does not exist yet -> create it and return the new node
00050                 childNodes.push_back(new Node<T>(value));
00051                 return childNodes[childNodes.size()-1];
00052         }
00053         // node with the given value already exists -> increment count and return the node
00054         childNodes[pos]->count++;
00055         return childNodes[pos];
00056 }

00078 template <class T> Node<T>* Tree<T>::insert(vector<T> &values)
00079 {
00080         Node<T>* n = root;
00081         for (unsigned int i=0; i<values.size(); i++)
00082         {
00083                 n = n->insertChildNode(values[i]);

00085         return n;

00088 template <class T> void Tree<T>::insert(PhrasePair* p)
00089 {
00090         // transform src-words into src-NodeOfTrees
00091         vector<NodeOfTrees*> src;
00092         src.resize(p->src.size());
00093         for (unsigned int i=0; i<p->src.size(); i++)
00094         {
00095                 src[i] = new NodeOfTrees(p->src[i], new Tree<unsigned int>(0));
00096         }
00097 
00098         // insert/increment src-path
00099         Node<T>* lastNode = this->insert(src);
00100 
00101         // concat target-path to the src-paths-last-node
00102         lastNode->value->tree->insert(p->target);
00103 }
